name: Microwave

name: Phone
description: Client is living alone in a HDB public rental flat and is estranged from his children. He suffered a workplace injury in Jan 2025, and is on MC until end Mar 2025. He has no savings and his bank accounts were compromised in late 2024 and he has not been able to access his accounts, including government payouts. He lost his phone in late 2024 as well and does not have the money to purchase one.

passiton.name: Alcom phone
passiton.description:
Brand new and working.

Only deliver to charitable organisations offices and not directly to beneficiary.
passiton.location: Boat Quay, Cecil, Havelock Road, Marina, People\

name: Shoes
description: Hi, there is a client, facing financial difficulties who requires a pair of sports shoes and a slipper as his current ones are worn-out. He is diagnosed with mental health conditions and is certified temporarily unfit for work. He does not have familial support and is hoping to receive some support to help him tide through his financial constraints. Client's shoe size is US46. For the slipper, he hopes to receive an open-toes slipper so that there would not be friction between his toes which has caused him discomfort and injury in the past. Thank you!

passiton.name: new balance shoes for walking
passiton.description: worn in well , very comfy
passiton.location: Ang Mo Kio, Bishan, Braddell, Thomson

name: Clothes

He does not have familial support and is hoping to receive some clothes support to help him tide through his financial constraints. Client requires pants of size US50 (long and short pants). Thank you!
